name: Pumpkin Body Butter
description:
Give Your Skin the Royal Treatment by giving it one of our Premium Body Butters!

Give dry skin the softness it craves with this super-creamy body butter. Enriched with shea butter, cocoa butter, jojoba oil and virgin coconut oil and other essential ingredients. Softens skin while effectively healing stretch marks and scarring. 

*All butters are made as soon as we receive an order*

Shelf life for up to 6 months

name: Honey and Almond Oil
description:
Pure Healing for Skin and Hair

100% pure sweet almond oil and honey is famous worldwide for its healing benefits. Almond oil is a rich source of vitamin E, vitamin D and essential minerals that work to heal and nourish skin and hair. Itâ€™s suitable for any skin type, no matter how sensitive and can be used alone or mixed with fragrance or essential oils to get the smell you want! You can also massage a few drops of almond oil into your hair to add luster and improve hair health.

name: Almond & Oatmeal Foot Scrub
description:
This scrub is a great exfoliate for your feet, making them feel smooth and rejuvenated! 

Products are made to order!
